items.content_html: A lightweight and superfast Chrome extension that automatically syncs code from CodeChef to GitHub upon successful submission within 3 seconds.
items.title: rithikg24/CodeSync: A lightweight and superfast Chrome extension that automatically syncs code from CodeChef to GitHub upon successful submission within 3 seconds.

items.content_html: Bring your code examples to life with the Magic Motion! This lightweight and customizable library allows you to effortlessly add stunning animations to your code snippets in React applications. Perfect for documentation, tutorials, or any project where you want to showcase code in a visually appealing manner.
items.title: illia-stv/magic-motion: Bring your code examples to life with the Magic Motion! This lightweight and customizable library allows you to effortlessly add stunning animations to your code snippets in React applications. Perfect for documentation, tutorials, or any project where you want to showcase code in a visually appealing manner.

items.content_html: SimpliStyle is a lightweight, customizable web component framework inspired by Apple's design principles. It provides a set of reusable, accessible UI components that can be easily integrated into any web project.
items.title: jameswquinn/SimpliStyle-Web-Components: SimpliStyle is a lightweight, customizable web component framework inspired by Apple's design principles. It provides a set of reusable, accessible UI components that can be easily integrated into any web project.

items.title: flofehrenbacher/hex-2-rgb: Super lightweight typescript function to convert hexes of format #RRGGBB to rgb of value rgb(x,y,z) or rgba(x,y,z,a).

items.content_html: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.
items.title: NicoSnts/Alke: Alke.js is a lightweight, GSAP-powered animation library that enables smooth, responsive animations via simple HTML attributes. Easily add fade-in effects, staggered animations, and more. Fully customizable with support for screen size-based disabling, making it perfect for modern, dynamic web projects.

items.content_html: This package offers a versatile collection of lightweight, scalable, and customizable icons for seamless integration with React and other modern web frameworks. Designed with accessibility in mind, these icons ensure clear, meaningful, and visually consistent representations for various use cases.
items.title: CoderMoniruzzamanR/design-flow-icon: This package offers a versatile collection of lightweight, scalable, and customizable icons for seamless integration with React and other modern web frameworks. Designed with accessibility in mind, these icons ensure clear, meaningful, and visually consistent representations for various use cases.

items.content_html: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.
items.title: JaCraig/Woodchuck: WoodChuck is a lightweight and extensible logging library for TypeScript, designed to simplify the process of logging messages in your applications. With customizable logging levels, type safety, and support for plugins, WoodChuck offers a flexible solution to track and understand your application's behavior.

items.content_html: üè† A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
items.title: jens-maus/RaspberryMatic: :house: A feature-rich but lightweight, buildroot-based Linux operating system alternative for your CloudFree CCU3/ELV-Charly 'homematicIP CCU' IoT smarthome central. Running as a pure virtual appliance (ProxmoxVE, Home Assistant, LXC, Docker/OCI, Kubernetes/K8s, etc.) on a dedicated embedded device (RaspberryPi, etc.) or generic x86/ARM hardware.
